business.headline: Trump's tariff war may backfire, says JPMorgan CEO, urges stronger India tiesJPMorgan CEO, Jamie Dimon, explained that higher costs of imported goods would affect consumers, while increased demand for local products could also drive prices up.

Unified Pension Scheme: Centre studying global models to manage UPS pool corpusThe government aims to create proper rules for investing the extra contribution made by it in a separate pension fund called the pool corpus under the newly launched Unified Pension Scheme (UPS).

Japan's Nikkei leads Asia's recovery as hopes rise for softer tariff approachA 5.6% rebound in Japan's Nikkei far outpaced other regional markets, with Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent and Trade Representative Jamieson Greer tasked with leading trade negotiations with Tokyo.

Explained: Why Titan share price jumped 7% after hitting 52-week lowThe recovery in Titan share price came just a day after the stock touched its 52-week low of Rs 2,947.55. In the morning session, Titan shares climbed to a high of Rs 3,222, providing some relief to investors after a tough few months.

Sensex, Nifty in green: Why is stock market rising today? 3 things to knowSensex, Nifty today: Tracking global markets that showed signs of recovery, Sensex and Nifty surged more than 1.5% in early trade, shaking off fears that had weighed heavily just a day earlier, with early buying seen across most sectors.
Sensex, Nifty gain as global markets recover from Trump's tariff shockThe S&P BSE Sensex surged 1,217.78 points to 74,355.68, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 380.50 points to 22,542.10 as of 9:35 am.
Global markets show signs of recovery. Will Sensex and Nifty gain today?A slight improvement in global markets, especially in the US and Asia, has brought some hope after the recent sell-off.

Stocks to watch on April 8: M&M, BEL, Adani Ports, Tata Motors, TitanInvestors are likely to keep a close eye on Tuesday's market, looking for signs of a rebound. Asian markets opened higher, offering some relief after a choppy session in the US.

Wall Street's fear gauge spikes, stocks sink as Trump stands firm on tariffsWall Street equities have been hammered since US President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs, announced on April 2, on all imports into the US and much higher levies on some major trading partners.

How market reacted briefly to Donald Trump tariff pause rumourA misinterpreted comment about Trump pausing tariffs briefly sent markets soaring before crashing. Social media spread the false claim, prompting a quick White House denial that ended the short-lived rally.

Wall Street slides again on tariff fears; will Sensex, Nifty follow suit?Wall Street remained weak on Monday, with all three major indexes falling for a third straight session. The drop came after US President Donald Trump announced a new round of heavy tariffs on imports, which led to retaliation from major trade partners, including China.

S&P 500 rebounds after early trade fall in volatile US market sessionThe S&P 500 has dropped 20% from its peak closing level reached in February. If it finishes at this level or lower, it would officially mark the start of a bear market from February onward.

entertainment.headline: Twinkle Khanna's niece Naomika steals hearts, internet thinks she's very prettyNaomika Saran, who's the granddaughter of Dimple Kapadia, joined her during the Maddock Films event on Monday in Mumbai. Her photos have taken over social media and people can't get enough of her beauty.

Is Sunny Deol ready to work with Shah Rukh Khan again after Darr? Actor respondsActor Sunny Deol recently opened up about the possibility of working with superstar Shah Rukh Khan once again. The pair had collaborated on the 1993 release, Darr.

Sunny Deol doesn't want Jaat to be called a religious film. Here's whyActor Sunny Deol recently attended a press event in the capital where he opened up about his upcoming release, Jaat, and said that he doesn't want it to be labelled as some kind of 'religious film.'

Wildfire unleashed: Allu Arjun's journey to global stardom, upwards and onwards!Pushpa or not, Allu Arjun is the mass star who's here to stay. Here's looking at the Icon Star's flourishing career that transcends boundaries.

Allu Arjun, Atlee team up for 'spectacular' sci-fi actioner, watch special announcementIt's official! Allu Arjun is teaming up with renowned filmmaker Atlee for his 22nd film. The special announcement was made on the actor's 43rd birthday on April 8.

Pride of India: PM Modi's letter to Manoj Kumar's wife salutes his rich legacyPrime Minister Narendra Modi mourned the loss of Bollywood veteran Manoj Kumar. He shared a heartwarming note on Tuesday, recollecting his meeting with the legend, and offering condolences to his family.

Want my time back: Vishal Dadlani on Indian Idol exit after judging 6 seasonsMusic composer and singer Vishal Dadlani announced in an Instagram post that he will not return to judge 'Indian Idol' after wrapping up season 6. He thanked his fellow judges - Shreya Ghoshal and Badshah - and wrote about wanting to get his 'time back'.

Gehraiyaan actor Dhairya Karwa gets married in Jaipur. Pic goes viralActor Dhairya Karwa, who shared screen space with Deepika Padukone in Gehraiyaan, recently got married in a private ceremony in Jaipur. A photo of the couple from the wedding is now going viral on social media.

Iron Man star Terrence Howard claims Diddy 'tried to have sex' with himAmerican actor Terrence Howard accused music mogul Sean 'Diddy' Combs of making unwanted sexual advances. The allegations have sparked widespread media attention and debate.

Sikandar box office Day 9: Salman Khan's film crashes on 2nd MondaySalman Khan's 'Sikandar' registered an abysmal second Monday at the box office. The film didn't do anything extraordinary during the weekend either, and Monday further took its trajectory downward at the ticket window.

TV actor Karan Patel on OTT becoming 'soft porn', getting no work for 6 years'Yeh Hai Mohabbatein' and 'Kasturi' star Karan Patel spoke to Bharti Singh on her podcast and revealed that he has not been offered any TV show for the last six years. He also commented on the OTT scene, and why he thinks it has become a 'sleaze'.

Empuraan beats Manjummel Boys to become highest-grossing Malayalam filmDirector Prithviraj Sukumaran's 'L2: Empuraan', starring Mohanlal is the highest-grossing Malayalam film. The film surpassed 'Manjummel Boys' by earning over Rs 250 crore worldwide.

Allu Arjun rings in 43rd birthday with wife Sneha, children. See picIt's Tollywood superstar Allu Arjun's day! The Pushpa star celebrated his 43rd birthday with his wife, Allu Sneha Reddy, and children. Sneha shared a picture from their intimate and cosy bash.

Pics: Suhana Khan, Agastya Nanda step out for dinner with friends in MumbaiSuhana Khan and Agastya Nanda, who are rumoured to be dating, were seen dining at a Mumbai restaurant on Monday. They were seen with their friends.

Court: Actor Nani-backed courtroom drama to premiere on Netflix this AprilThe courtroom drama Court-State vs a Nobody is set to stream on Netflix from April 11. The film directed by Ram Jagadeesh, is backed by actor Nani.

How much does Nick Jonas earn? A peek into his lavish lifestyleNick Jonas, with a joint net worth of $80 million alongside wife Priyanka Chopra, built his fortune through music, acting, business ventures like Villa One tequila, real estate, and brand endorsements.

Ed Sheeran teams up with Arijit Singh for new album? Here's what we knowSingers Ed Sheeran and Arijit Singh's upcoming album collaboration has fans buzzing with excitement. The British singer confirmed the same during a recent podcast interview.

Bollywood has to own its mess and clean it: Nushratt BharucchaActor Nushrratt Bharuccha, in an exclusive interaction with India Today Digital, opened up about the post-pandemic struggles of Hindi cinema.

Jr NTR shares warm moment with Sukumar, fans hope for reunion. See pic A heartwarming photo of Jr NTR and Sukumar, shared by the director's wife Tabitha, has sent fans into a frenzy, sparking renewed speculation of a potential collaboration.

general news.headline: Cannot sit on bills: Top court raps Tamil Nadu Governor, clears 10 pending billsIn a landmark ruling, the Supreme Court declared that Governors cannot indefinitely delay action on bills, calling such inaction unconstitutional and illegal.

Supreme Court cancels CBI probe into additional teacher posts in BengalThe bench, led by CJI Sanjiv Khanna, observed that there was no need for judicial intervention as the additional posts were created by the Bengal education department only after necessary consultations and also with the approval of the Governor.

Chaos in Jammu and Kashmir Assembly over Waqf Act, PDP leader marshalled outThe Jammu and Kashmir Assembly saw uproar as opposition parties clashed over the Waqf Amendment Act, prompting adjournment, slogan-shouting, and demands for the Speaker's removal.

JEE candidates miss exam due to Deputy Chief Minister's convoy, probe orderedOver 20 JEE aspirants in Visakhapatnam allegedly missed their exam due to traffic delays reportedly caused by Deputy CM Pawan Kalyan's convoy. However, the police denied the allegation, but Kalyan's office ordered an inquiry into the incident.

Watch: Dire wolves howl again after more than 10,000 yearsColossal Biosciences has created three wolf pups that look like dire wolves, extinct for over 10,000 years. Using ancient DNA and CRISPR tech, scientists revived their appearance—but not their instincts.

Supreme Court raps governors for stalling bills, sets deadline to act: Top quotesIn a sharp rebuke, a bench of Justices JB Pardiwala and R Mahadevan said Tamil Nadu Governor RN Ravi's actions were not in good faith and went against constitutional principles.

KKR vs LSG: Smart Kolkata face confident Lucknow in City of JoyIPL 2025, KKR vs LSG Match Preview: Kolkata Knight Riders and Lucknow Super Giants will be looking to continue their winning momentum when they face each other in Kolkata on Tuesday, April 8.

Trump's tariff war may backfire, says JPMorgan CEO, urges stronger India tiesJPMorgan CEO, Jamie Dimon, explained that higher costs of imported goods would affect consumers, while increased demand for local products could also drive prices up.

Is your vitamin D low? Your gut might be paying the priceThat post-lunch bloat, those unpredictable bathroom visits, and even chronic conditions like IBS or IBD could be tied to that sunshine vitamin you've been neglecting.

Sensex, Nifty in green: Why is stock market rising today? 3 things to knowSensex, Nifty today: Tracking global markets that showed signs of recovery, Sensex and Nifty surged more than 1.5% in early trade, shaking off fears that had weighed heavily just a day earlier, with early buying seen across most sectors.

Huge victory: MK Stalin after top court's ruling on Governor withholding billsTamil Nadu Chief Minister MK Stalin hailed the Supreme Court verdict against Governor RN Ravi's delay in bill assent as a major win for state autonomy, saying Tamil Nadu will keep fighting, and winning, for federalism.

China unfazed by Trump's 50% tariff threat, vows to fight to the endTrump threatened China with an additional 50 per cent tariff amid escalating trade tensions, prompting strong retaliatory measures from Beijing, including rare-earth export controls.

Indian woman shares US airport horror story, says male officer physically checked herAn Indian woman claimed she was detained at a US airport, stripped of her warm clothes, and a male officer physically checked her.

No country left off: Top US official justifies Trump tariffs on penguin islandsUS Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick defended the 10 per cent tariffs on the uninhabited Heard and McDonald Islands, arguing it was a deliberate effort to close "ridiculous loopholes" that allowed countries to evade tariffs.

Twisted my words: Karnataka Minister clarifies 'molestation here and there' remarkKarnataka Home Minister G Parameshwara clarified his remarks on the Bengaluru sexual assault case, saying his statement was twisted. He expressed regret if women were hurt and reiterated his commitment to women's safety.

Elon Musk privately asked Trump to back down on China tariffs: ReportElon Musk took his fight against tariffs straight to Trump, hoping to change his mind. While clashing publicly with advisers, Musk quietly made his case behind the scenes—so far, without success.

Is Sunny Deol ready to work with Shah Rukh Khan again after Darr? Actor respondsActor Sunny Deol recently opened up about the possibility of working with superstar Shah Rukh Khan once again. The pair had collaborated on the 1993 release, Darr.

Microsoft fires Indian-origin techie, another for protest during 50th anniversaryVaniya Agrawal was already serving a two-week notice period before she was asked to leave immediately. Along with her, another software engineer, Ibtihal Aboussad, was also fired for protesting against the company's alleged role in providing technological support to Israel in its military campaign in Gaza.

Karnataka 2nd PUC Results 2025 Live: Class 12 Results Today, Where to CheckKSEAB Class 12th Results Live Updates: The Karnataka School Examination and Assessment Board (KSEAB) will declare the 2nd PUC (Class 12) Exam 1 results today, April 8, 2025. The results will be announced anytime soon in the press conference by the board authorities, and the scorecard download link will be activated at 1:30 pm. Students can check their provisional mark sheets on karresults.nic.in and kseab.karnataka.gov.in.

Andhra Deputy Chief Minister Pawan Kalyan's son hurt in Singapore fire accidentAndhra Pradesh Deputy Chief Minister Pawan Kalyan's son was injured in a fire accident at his Singapore school. Kalyan has cancelled all his engagements to go to Singapore.
2025 Maruti Suzuki Grand Vitara launched with standard 6 airbags and upgradesThe updated Grand Vitara now offers six airbags across all variants, along with a host of new features.

Sam Altman defends ChatGPT copying Studio Ghibli style, says AI art is good for societyOpenAI CEO Sam Altman defends AI-generated art, saying it enhances creativity rather than replacing it. In a recent podcast with Indian entrepreneur Varun Mayya, Altman addressed concerns around AI but also noted that he believes AI will reshape jobs and unlock new creative opportunities, especially in fast-growing markets like India.

Twinkle Khanna's niece Naomika steals hearts, internet thinks she's very prettyNaomika Saran, who's the granddaughter of Dimple Kapadia, joined her during the Maddock Films event on Monday in Mumbai. Her photos have taken over social media and people can't get enough of her beauty.

Caught on CCTV: Drunk driver runs over 3 on Jaipur street as people run in panicEyewitnesses claimed that several pedestrians narrowly escaped, screaming in panic as the car swerved wildly. The accused, Usman, struck a motorcycle, a scooter, and a total of three vehicles in a row, causing mayhem in a narrow, over-crowded lane in Nahargarh.

sports.headline: When will Rohit Sharma perform? Fans ask question of MI starMumbai Indians fans have started to ask questions about their former captain Rohit Sharma. Criticism has mounted on the opener after yet another poor outing in the IPL 2025.

Rajat Patidar 4th captain to be fined for slow over rate in IPL 2025Royal Challengers Bengaluru captain Rajat Patidar has been fined Rs 12 lakh for maintaining a slow over-rate against Mumbai Indians. Rajat is the 4th captain to get fined this season.

Rishabh Pant recalls Ashish Nehra's invaluable advice during tough timesLSG captain Rishabh Pant recalled Ashish Nehra's invaluable advice ahead of the team's match against KKR. Pant said that Nehra's advice helped him through tough times when he was struggling physically and mentally.

Rishabh Pant joins Sanjiv Goenka in Kolkata to cheer for Mohun Bagan SG in ISL semisIPL 2025: Ahead of Lucknow Super Giants' away game in Kolkata, captain Rishabh Pant and owner Sanjiv Goenka were seen cheering for Mohun Bagan SG during their semi-final second-leg win over Jamshedpur FC in Kolkata on Monday.

Chahal's advice for next-gen IPL spinners: Make yourself mentally toughYuzvendra Chahal, the leading wicket-taker in the IPL, has said that new-age spinners need to be mentally tough to survive in the tournament. He has advised youngsters to learn how to handle pressure.

Powerplay with both bat and ball a big concern for MI: Coach JayawardeneMumbai Indians head coca Mahela Jayawardene has said that his team is lacking in the powerplay with both bat and ball. After their loss against RCB, MI are at the 8th position in the IPL points table.

KKR vs LSG Live Score: Kolkata host Lucknow in a mid-table clashKolkata Knight Riders (KKR) vs Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) Live Score IPL 2025: Kolkata Knight Riders will host Lucknow Super Giants in a mid-table group clash in the Indian Premier League on Tuesday at the Eden Gardens in Kolkata. Check out this space of all updates related to IPL.

Bhuvneshwar Kumar goes past Bravo, becomes most successful pacer in IPL historyRCB fast bowler Bhuvneshwar Kumar scripted history with the wicket of Tilak Varma on Monday. With the wicket, Bhuvneshwar overtook Dwayne Bravo as the fast bowler with most wickets in the history of the IPL.

Devdutt Padikkal credits captain Rajat Patidar for RCB's brilliant startRoyal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) batter Devdutt Padikkal has credited captain Rajat Patidar for his side's impressive start in the ongoing IPL 2025 after the 12-run win over MI.

Watch: Apuia's last-gasp worldie take Mohun Bagan to ISL FinalLalengmawia 'Apuia' Ralte scored a world-class last-gasp goal helped Mohun Bagan qualify for the final of the Indian Super League on Monday, April 7. Apuia's goal left the Kolkata crowd stunned.

Rajat Patidar's RCB not a one-man show anymoreIPL 2025: With Rajat Patidar leading from the front, Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) have played as a unit, making a brilliant start to their campaign. On Monday, RCB stormed to their third win out of four matches in the ongoing tournament after beating Mumbai Indians by 12 runs.

KKR vs LSG Live Score: Kolkata host Lucknow in a mid-table clashKolkata Knight Riders (KKR) vs Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) Live Score IPL 2025: Kolkata Knight Riders will host Lucknow Super Giants in a mid-table group clash in the Indian Premier League on Tuesday at the Eden Gardens in Kolkata. Rajat Patidar's RCB not a one-man show anymoreIPL 2025: With Rajat Patidar leading from the front, Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) have played as a unit, making a brilliant start to their campaign. On Monday, RCB stormed to their third win out of four matches in the ongoing tournament after beating Mumbai Indians by 12 runs.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
